tool.name: tool_3

param.name: INPUT
param.dialogReference:
Features

Grid, input

Features are all pixels not representing a no-data value.

param.name: NORM
param.dialogReference:
Type of distance calculation

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Chessboard

[1] Manhattan

[2] Euclidean

Default: 0

tool.summary: Distance to feature cells on a raster. Feature cells are all cells not representing a no-data value.
